member.summary: A wrapper around a "ref" or "out" argument invoked dynamically.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the wrapped value as an object.

member.name: P:Lerp2Console.RefOutArg.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the wrapped value.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class wrapping the default value of .
member.typeparam: The type of value to wrap.
member.returns: A new instance of the class wrapping the default value of .

member.name: T:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers
member.summary: A dynamic object that allows access to a type's static members, resolved dynamically at runtime.

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class wrapping the specified type.

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.TryGetMember(System.Dynamic.GetMemberBinder,System.Object@)
member.summary: Gets a value for a static property defined by the wrapped type.
member.param: Provides information about the object that called the dynamic operation. The binder.Name property provides the name of the member on which the dynamic operation is performed. For example, for the Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty) statement, where sampleObject is an instance of the class derived from the class, binder.Name returns "SampleProperty". The binder.IgnoreCase property specifies whether the member name is case-sensitive.
The result of the get operation. For example, if the method is called for a property, you can assign the property value to .
member.returns: true if the operation is successful; otherwise, false. If this method returns false, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.)

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.TrySetMember(System.Dynamic.SetMemberBinder,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a value for a static property defined by the wrapped type.
member.param: Provides information about the object that called the dynamic operation. The binder.Name property provides the name of the member to which the value is being assigned. For example, for the statement sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test", where sampleObject is an instance of the class derived from the class, binder.Name returns "SampleProperty". The binder.IgnoreCase property specifies whether the member name is case-sensitive.
The value to set to the member. For example, for sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test", where sampleObject is an instance of the class derived from the class, the is "Test".
member.returns: true if the operation is successful; otherwise, false. If this method returns false, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.)

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.TryInvokeMember(System.Dynamic.InvokeMemberBinder,System.Object[],System.Object@)
member.summary: Calls a static method defined by the wrapped type.
member.param: Provides information about the dynamic operation. The binder.Name property provides the name of the member on which the dynamic operation is performed. For example, for the statement sampleObject.SampleMethod(100), where sampleObject is an instance of the class derived from the class, binder.Name returns "SampleMethod". The binder.IgnoreCase property specifies whether the member name is case-sensitive.

The arguments that are passed to the object member during the invoke operation. For example, for the statement sampleObject.SampleMethod(100), where sampleObject is derived from the class, args[0] is equal to 100.
The result of the member invocation.
member.returns: true if the operation is successful; otherwise, false. If this method returns false, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.)

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.Create(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class wrapping the specified type.
member.param: The underlying type to wrap. May not be null.
member.returns: An instance of , as a dynamic type.

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.DynamicStaticTypeMembers.Create``1
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class wrapping the specified type.
member.returns: An instance of , as a dynamic type.

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.Program.AcceptCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates a new Socket to handle remote host communication.
member.param: the status of an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.Program.ReceiveCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Asynchronously receive data from a connected Socket.
member.param: the status of an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lerp2Console.Program.SendCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Sends data asynchronously to a connected Socket.
member.param: The status of an asynchronous operation
